@vjpai Why can't we use anonymous lambda captures?

Anonymous lambda captures are error-prone and imprecise; although people say that about `auto`, this is a worse situation since these can easily lead to dangling pointer bugs when some new variable comes along. I think we've allowed in maybe 1 or 2 into our whole codebase and that was where there really was no other option because of some other issue. [The Bible](https://google.github.io/styleguide/cppguide.html) no longer forbids them but also strongly doesn't prefer them.
